title: Meet With School Counselor
description: Discuss graduation requirements, GPA, testing plans, and initial college goals.

title: Create College Interest List
description: Begin researching colleges based on location, size, majors, and admissions requirements.

title: Begin SAT / ACT Preparation
description: Start consistent test prep using online tools, books, or tutoring if needed.

title: Register for Spring SAT / ACT
description: Sign up early to secure preferred test dates and locations.

title: Take AP Exams
description: AP scores may earn college credit or strengthen applications.

title: Ask for Letters of Recommendation
description: Request recommendations from teachers before summer break.

title: Visit Colleges (Virtual or In-Person)
description: Explore campuses to refine your college list.

title: Create Common App Account
description: Familiarize yourself with application sections and requirements.

title: Start College Essays
description: Draft personal statements and supplemental essays early.

title: Finalize College List
description: Confirm where you will apply and which deadlines apply to each school.

title: FAFSA Opens
description: Submit financial aid forms as early as possible.

title: Scholarship Applications Begin
description: Apply for local, state, and national scholarships.

title: Confirm Recommendations & Transcripts
description: Ensure all supporting documents have been submitted.

title: Admission Decisions Released
description: Review acceptance letters and financial aid offers.

title: National College Decision Day
description: Submit enrollment deposit to the college you choose.
